Changelog
=========


0.2 (2017-07-28)
----------------

- Add tile option to specify filename of a multifile gist.
- Render gist code in noscript tag.
- Add option to specify title level (h1 to h6)
- Allow inline rendering of gists using pygments syntax highlighter.


0.1 (2017-06-04)
----------------

- Initial release.
